measure.name: nze_hvac
measure.description: This measure replaces the existing HVAC system if any with the user selected HVAC system. The user can select how to partition the system, applying it to the whole building, a system per building type, a system per building story, or automatically partition based on residential/non-residential occupany types and space loads.
measure.modeler_description: HVAC system creation logic uses [openstudio-standards](https://github.com/NREL/openstudio-standards) and efficiency values are defined in the openstudio-standards Standards spreadsheet under the *NREL ZNE Ready 2017* template.

choice.value: true
choice.display_name: true

choice.value: false
choice.display_name: false

argument.description: Details on HVAC system type in measure documentation.

argument.name: doas_dcv
argument.display_name: DOAS capable of demand control ventilation?
argument.description: If a DOAS system, this will make air terminals variable air volume instead of constant volume.

choice.value: true
choice.display_name: true

choice.value: false
choice.display_name: false

argument.name: hvac_system_partition
argument.description: Automatic Partition will separate the HVAC system by residential/non-residential and if loads and schedules are substantially different.
